product_name: Komperdell XA-10 First Layer Thermo Fleece Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The heavyweight Komperdell XA-10 First Layer Thermo Fleece Top warms your core while moving away excess moisture off your skin, so you stay comfortable whether snowshoeing or hanging out in the lodge. Polyester/viscose blend retains heat, wicks moisture and resists odor; spandex adds stretch and shape retention. Half-zip design allows easy ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: The heavyweight Komperdell XA-10 First Layer Thermo Fleece Top warms your core while moving away excess moisture off your skin, so you stay comfortable whether snowshoeing or hanging out in the lodge.
